President Weah steps in to reverse Liberia's U.N. vote against Gaza ceasefireLiberian President George Weah has intervened to reverse his country's vote against a U.N. resolution calling for a ceasefire in the Gaza Strip, the West African nation's information ministry said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 18:18:45 GMT RCB5JXD6T5MLFLDL536VF4XARU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/president-weah-steps-reverse-liberias-un-vote-against-gaza-ceasefire-2023-12-19/Reuters世界非洲
Poland dismisses its representative at World Bank, drawing central bank rebukePoland's new government has dismissed the country's representative to the World Bank, the prime minister said on Tuesday, drawing a rebuke from the central bank that had appointed him to the role. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 18:15:19 GMT 5WJJTYGNTBL4DJOOODCVZZIANU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-dismisses-its-representative-world-bank-drawing-central-bank-rebuke-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Zelenskiy says he has working relationship with army chiefUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy on Tuesday dismissed suggestions of a rift with army chief Valery Zaluzhny and said he maintains a working relationship with the top general. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:49:32 GMT MQLP6WSE5NOYRH55K2BH5JRRYI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-says-he-has-working-relationship-with-army-chief-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Mexican president says his country is world's leading cultural powerMexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador on Tuesday declared his country to be the foremost cultural power in the world, praising its ethnic and culinary diversity and international appeal. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:34:03 GMT IHTQJHLSWNPE5BSBBYBQC5WYE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-president-says-his-country-is-worlds-leading-culture-power-2023-12-19/Reuters世界美洲
Zelenskiy confident U.S. won't 'betray' Ukraine over financial supportUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Tuesday he was confident the U.S. would not "betray" his country by withholding crucial wartime funding as it fights off a Russian invasion. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:28:54 GMT YQHTFY2LLZLF7J7E3HZEQHVT7E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-confident-us-wont-betray-ukraine-over-financial-support-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
High civilian toll in Gaza is cost of crushing Hamas, Israeli military officials sayHeavy civilian casualties are the cost of Israel's intense campaign to destroy Hamas in Gaza and the militants' urban warfare strategy, Israeli military officials said, in the face of global alarm at the staggering toll from the bombing. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:08:09 GMT ZSN3MJSL55PLZFAZVVT3S5XVXA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/high-civilian-toll-gaza-is-cost-crushing-hamas-israeli-military-officials-say-2023-12-19/Frank Daniel世界中东
Iraq's ruling Shi'ite alliance leads in provincial elections - preliminary resultsParties that make up Iraq's Shi'ite ruling alliance together took the single-largest bloc of votes in Baghdad and most of the country's southern provinces in provincial council elections, a Reuters tally of preliminary results showed. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:02:58 GMT NWQUDK5IPVPVPJHRI4NNBR7QNM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iraqs-ruling-shiite-alliance-leads-provincial-elections-preliminary-results-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Ukraine's military asks for additional 450,000-500,000 people to be mobilised - ZelenskiyUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Tuesday that the military had asked for an additional 450,000-500,000 people to be mobilised into the army, but that a final decision had not been taken. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 16:43:56 GMT HETCQJ6DSRJ55K3VM66VLLVQAU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-military-asks-additional-450000-500000-people-be-mobilized-zelenskiy-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Hijacked ship off Somalia fuels fears pirates back in Red Sea watersA merchant ship sailing off Somalia has been hijacked by unknown raiders, Spain's defence ministry said on Tuesday, fuelling fears pirates are returning to the Gulf of Aden and Red Sea waters already plagued by a surge in attacks on shipping. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 16:41:51 GMT PBE5PUD3JJPXZB3VU3Y3C3TIYE https://www.reuters.com/world/hijacked-ship-off-somalia-fuels-fears-pirates-back-red-sea-waters-2023-12-19/Jonathan Saul, Emma Pinedo, Abdi Sheikh世界
Qatar, Israel hostage talks positive but deal not imminent - sourceA meeting between Qatar’s prime minister and the heads of Israel’s Mossad spy agency and the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) in Warsaw on Monday about hostages held by Hamas was positive but there is no expectation of an imminent deal, according to a source briefed on the diplomatic efforts. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 16:28:01 GMT XSLAR6BR7FOOZK2PYZQGIAY22M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/qatar-israel-hostage-talks-positive-deal-not-imminent-source-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
WHO classifies JN.1 coronavirus strain as 'variant of interest'The World Health Organization (WHO) on Tuesday classified the JN.1 coronavirus strain as a "variant of interest", but said it did not pose much threat to public health. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 16:09:40 GMT A4FQP22KCVLJFCAHCYSKWZTQTU https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/who-classizes-jn1-covid-19-variant-interest-2023-12-19/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
